page.title: 03Social Concern BARRAGE
page.content: The Severn estuary has the second fastest tidal range in the world, that is why it is one of the best spots for a tidal barrage to be built. It is to be based between Cardiff and Weston Super Mare. Green Peace,a conservation group,and the people who live near the site are against having the barrage for a number of reasons. Green Peace are against it because the birds stopping on the mudflats will lose their feeding grounds.The people are against it because the farmers will have to spend more money on drainage and that will mean they will lose farmland and also affect the marshland nature reserve in Magor. The Government are in favour of it because it will provide lots of work and will generate electricity without using nuclear power.
